DOC.brief_summary: The study aim validate Food Frequency Questionnaire ( FFQ ) design specifically vegan population Israel . The participant complete FFQ , data verify evaluate participant energy expenditure ( measure BMR , body composition daily activity ) conduct 24-hour food interview .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Validating Food Frequency Questionnaires ( FFQ ) Vegan Population Israel
DOC.criteria: consumption beef , chicken , fish , egg , milk dairy month , last 6 month age 1840 consumption beef , chicken , fish , egg , milk dairy month chronic condition ( diabetes , hypertension , cardiovascular disease )
